actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, for the purpose of repealing the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to determine rates and charges for stockyard services.

summary.text: Amends the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, to repeal the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to determine rates and charges for stockyard services. Requires the authorized State department, agency, or association which is registered as a market agency to determine brand inspection fees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Packers and Stockyards Act, 1921, for the purpose of repealing the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to determine rates and charges for stockyard services.
